CURRENT THREAT LEVEL IN
THE UK


The current threat level in the UK from international terrorism is severe. That means that a terrorist attack is highly likely.


The threat to Great Britain from Northern Irish terrorism is moderate. This means that a terrorist attack is possible, but not likely.
